name: dragon-energy
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.
